类 BaseTM

java.lang.Object
utm.TuringMachine
BaseTM
直接已知子类:

public class BaseTM extends utm.TuringMachine
Base Turing Machine configuration manager.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BaseTM

      public BaseTM(int rulesNumber, String initialState, String acceptState, String rejectState, BaseUTM baseUTM)
      Constructor of the BaseTM
      参数:
      rulesNumber - The number of rules that the machine will have.
      initialState - A string representing the TM's initial state.
      acceptState - A string representing the TM's accept state.
      rejectState - A string representing the TM's reject state.
      baseUTM - The specification of base Universal Turing Machine.
